thread.title: Tom’s Hardware: For The Hardcore PC Enthusiast
thread.title_full: Tom’s Hardware: For The Hardcore PC Enthusiast

title: Tom’s Hardware: For The Hardcore PC Enthusiast
text:
Testing EVGA's GeForce GTX 1080 FTW2 With New iCX Cooler Feb 10, 2017 
Does a new heat sink translate to new success? EVGA complements its existing technology with some on-board sensors and gives enthusiasts access to asynchronous fan control. Best Memory Feb 9, 2017 
Here are the best performing RAM kits we’ve tested: computer memory that’s ideal for gaming, video editing and graphics-heavy applications. Enermax D.F. 500W PSU Review Feb 9, 2017 
The Enermax D.F. 500W is a fully modular PSU featuring high efficiency, quiet operation, and individually sleeved cables. But are those enough to justify its premium price tag? Best Virtual Reality HMDs Feb 8, 2017 
Here are the best Virtual Reality Headsets currently available for the PC. Ranging from $400 to over $1000, these are truly the ultimate gaming peripherals. Best Gaming Laptops Feb 8, 2017 
We tested gaming laptops with a series of real-world and synthetic benchmarks to measure battery, cooling, CPU, display, GPU, storage, and overall system performance. Best PSUs Feb 8, 2017 
Here are the best power supplies for gaming PCs. These PSUs offer the best reliability, performance and protection for your components. Corsair Crystal 460X ATX Mid-Tower Case Review Feb 8, 2017 
The Crystal 460X stands out with triple RGB fans behind tempered glass panels, and stands apart with space for an EATX motherboard inside an 18” ATX mid-tower. Does it perform well enough to justify an upper-market price? Best PC Builds Feb 7, 2017 
Here are nine gaming PC builds that are recommended by the Tom’s Hardware community. These builds range from $500 to $2,500 and include three VR-ready systems. Gigabyte P57W v6 Gaming Laptop Review Feb 7, 2017 
The Gigabyte P57W v6 is a 17" laptop equipped with Nvidia's GeForce GTX 1060. We've tested many GTX 1060 configurations before; will the P57W shine in comparison? Best Cooling Feb 6, 2017 
Here are the best CPU cooling solutions (air and liquid) for a range of systems, from small form-factor builds to overclocked big-rigs. Best Graphics Feb 6, 2017 
Here are the best gaming GPUs for the money. These graphics cards offer the best performance at their price and resolution (from 720p to 4K).
